Articles.Content:
Here is a chart i made showing the power generation of the various solar panels at the planets of KSP so that everyone can make safe calculations and not run out of electricity

http://i.imgur.com/EmGIZhU.jpg

Why do the graphs for the four medium-sized panels all look different when the numbers are the same? The graph is misleading to say that the SP-L 1x6 is more efficient than the others. Otherwise good job. Would be interesting to see how they perform at really low or really high orbits, closer than Moho or farther than Eeloo. You also probably don't have to include the moons as they are all the same as the planet they orbit.
